title: Aegis — NLP-Driven Video Intelligence Platform
summary: A platform combining NLP-based transcription, semantic indexing, and metadata extraction for intelligent video retrieval.

title: CredScore — Explainable Credit Scoring System
summary: An interpretable credit scoring engine integrating ML models, SHAP/LIME explanations, and rule-based validation for transparent lending.

title: Real-Time Fraud Detection Engine
summary: A hybrid anomaly detection pipeline combining time-series analysis, NLP-driven feature extraction, and pattern scoring.

title: SmartCare — Eldercare Analytics Platform
summary: An early proactive care analytics system for symptom evaluation, triage support, and caregiver guidance in eldercare settings.

title: Cloud Cost Observability & Optimization
summary: Whitepaper describing methods for cloud cost transparency, consumption analytics, and operational cost governance.

title: Event-Driven ISO20022 Modernization
summary: Architecture paper outlining cloud-ready patterns for ISO20022 transformation, event orchestration, and schema modernization.

title: Secure SaaS on Azure — DevSecOps Blueprint
summary: Blueprint for building secure SaaS systems on Azure with identity isolation, policy enforcement, CI/CD hardening, and observability.

title: DevSecOps Culture for Regulated SaaS
summary: Invited talk on establishing security-by-design engineering culture in regulated SaaS environments.

title: AI-Driven Credit Analytics in Lending Platforms
summary: Talk exploring ML-driven credit analytics, explainable underwriting models, and document intelligence in lending workflows.

title: Automated Security Vulnerability Triaging — SEC-2023-41
summary: Technical disclosure describing ML-assisted vulnerability classification and prioritization for multi-tenant SaaS platforms.
